PLAN:
Start metoprolol 25mg BID
Continue aspirin 81mg daily
Follow up in cardiology clinic in 2 weeks
Repeat echo in 3 months

HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS:
72 yo F with PAF, CAD s/p stent 2019, presents with palpitations x 3 days. Reports rapid heart rate, dizziness. No chest pain or syncope.

IMPRESSION:
• Atrial fibrillation with RVR
• CAD - stable
• HTN

VITAL SIGNS:
HR 142 irregular
BP: 138/86
RR:20  SpO2 94% RA
T 98.2F
